author: Odeinoichus
title: Experience Dots Cheaply and Easily.
review:
Set #30556 Mini Frame: New this year is LEGO Dots, a theme basically designed to inspire creative fun using small 1x1 tile elements and jewelry parts. It’s basically another attempt at a jewelry LEGO theme similar to Clickits. And I feel that this theme will involve more building and work out better than Clickits did. This Polybag introduces me to the theme and I am actually fairly impressed with the model here, but I’m not sure I’d go in for the entire theme.

Pros:

  • Very nice model. Works well as a small picture frame.
  • Enough tiles included for any design you’d care to create for your frame.
  • Very nice price per piece ratio.

Cons:

  • Not for everybody, mostly for folks who enjoy arts and crafts with their LEGO bricks.

Overall opinion

I bought this because it is a Polybag. I like the solid look of the model, but I’m not going to be very creative with it. I guarantee it. That being said, for the target demographic interested in this Theme, this is a solid set. Definitely recommend getting it if you enjoy these sorts of themes. The colour choice is also highly desirable and very well implemented. Recommended.
